$MSFT Everyone is so bullish on earnings. I see people posting 300+ after earnings. For fun I am going opposite and say target 204 to 218 after earnings. Don’t get bent out of shape either, just having fun since everyone is all bulled up.

$SPY If $MSFT and $GOOG misses earnings tomorrow the market crash should start somewhat, If $FB loses more users the crash will continue the following day. If $appl misses earnings, a market crash to $400 SPY will happen immediately and a correction to $340 will be the end result before we find out where we are going after that. I know it's a tall order but just in case it happens that's what will happen.
$GOOGL & $MSFT are going to save the market tomorrow.
$MSFT Azure to the moon 🌚
